channel.title: Project 2006
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Runescape 2006 remake [/size]
[size=14pt]Im going to add slayer. Add Farming, fix Door system add sound and music, fix teles add castle wars, And much more what the source needs.[/size]
Completed Incomplete Not Started
[size=24pt][color=red]Melee:[/color][/size] Melee combat: Perfect specials Perfect delayed hits with animation Combat Flawless maxhit calculation Clipped following
Range: Perfect projectiles + drawback Specials perfectly timed Deleting + dropping arrows Delayed hits Longrange vs rapid and accurate Ranging while clipped following
Mage: Perfect spelltime calculation Mage following when autocast clipped Correct rune amounts All non combat spells
[size=18pt]Non-Combat Skills: [/size]
[size=14pt]Runecrafting:[/size] Talisman location Pouches Multiple ess based on level [/color] [size=18pt]Agility:[/size] Multiple courses Rewards: Werewolf: sticks right before zipline, trade in for exp Gnome & barbarian: agility tickets to exchange for exp or rewards such as pirate hook or herbs
Herblore Herb Identifying Pestle & Mortar Potion making Mixing potions [/COLOR]
Thieving: Stall support Most nearby guards will attack you if caught thieving Pickpocketing Pickpocket failing
[size=24pt]crafting:[/size] Jewelry Stringing Hides Gem cutting
[color=green]Fletching:[/color] Cutting logs with knife All log types supported Making + stringing of longbow's and shortbows Arrows
Slayer: Full task support easy, medium, hard, expert Slayer Gem Slayer Mask Required equipment for slayer monsters Task resetting
Mining + Smithing: Full ore depletion and regeneration of rocks Mining gems Rock smoking - breaking pickaxe if you don't get off it Spawning golems randomly, level based off your combat level Smithing with coal requirement Refining iron ore based on level
Fishing + cooking: All spots Required equipment + bait Correct animation and timer for getting fish Cooking of all fish and uncooked products Proper level requirements for cooking Proper levels to no longer burn + cooking gauntlets support
Firemaking + Woodcutting: Full tree support, trees have certain amount of logs before disappearing Trees have longer regrow times depending on type Full clipped firemaking with force walk west. You put a log on the ground and then light it, so if you walk away you leave a log. If you burn fast enough your animation doesn't take place
Undead Waves: <---- ima dele later game with the base - 20 waves - Waves are always different, can have an unlimited combination of the three npcs being (Giant zombie, zombie, nechromancer) - Each wave has one more than the last, wave 20 has 20 npcs, 19 has 19 ect. - If you fail before you complete you are simply given coins per wave - If you complete all 20 you are rewarded with a casket that has a mystery inside
Mage Arena: Graveyard minigame Alchemists playground Enchanters minigame Progress hat dialogue pizzaz points for infinity and wands
Duel Arena: Full staking support Rules support Anti-dupe, x-logging, scamming.
Jad: Undecided how many waves Jad mage, range, melee Other npcs in the Jad waves with proper hits and moves
Barrows: Random brother in cave each time Random Barrow loot Kill counts increase loot Cave collapsing Digging to get to their dens
Random Events: Evil Chicken Tree spirit Frogs Gene Mime Drill Sergeant Rock Golem
Perfect combat with respect to player armor and npc's attack type and level Proper animations and economical drops Npc Vs Npc combat Respect to multizones Aggression
Bosses: Kalphite Queen Jad Gunthar (level 112) Khazard General Dragons
Pictures: http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/6928/talismanm.png http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg851/scaled.php?server=851&filename=bagi.png&res=landing http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/851/bagi.png/ http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/404/multiplerunes.png http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/714/arrowheads.png/ http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/209/logsfletch.png/ http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/585/makinglogs.png/ http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/857/k8fz.mp4/ http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/708/39y.mp4/
[size=24pt]Need Development Team For example: 1 or 2 more coder other than myself, Website maker, Advertirsers-video makers, Beta Testers, Leave a Reply at the bottom Applying: In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: Skype: What position do you want? (website maker, Coder, Pre-alfa testers, video maker-advertiser): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you help out each day?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?:
My Skype: James.portnoy1
[/size]

item.title: Project 2006
item.dc:creator: @gears2011 gears2011
item.description:
@gears2011 wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: dream / gears2011
How old are you?: 16
Skype: josh.magee5
What position do you want? (website maker, Coder, Pre-alfa testers, video maker-advertiser):advertiser/tester
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?:
What time zone are you in?: +10 gmt (australia)
How long will you help out each day?: 3-5 hours a day
Why do you want to become part of this server?: to relive the 2006 memories, have fun and be part of a rising community.
Any Suggestions?: none that i can think of but i’ll come up with a few

i also have an experienced past as an administrator for quite a few rsps.

Read full topic

Obviously I’m not implying your using any of those bases…[/quote]well its icy realm

item.title: Project 2006

item.description:
@james4370 wrote:

                                  [size=36pt]Runescape 2006 remake [/size]

[size=14pt]Im going to add slayer. Add Farming, fix Door system add sound and music, fix teles add castle wars, And much more what the source needs.[/size]

                            Completed Incomplete Not Started

[size=24pt][color=red]Melee:[/color][/size]
Melee combat:
Perfect specials
Perfect delayed hits with animation
Combat
Flawless maxhit calculation
Clipped following

Range:
Perfect projectiles + drawback
Specials perfectly timed
Deleting + dropping arrows
Delayed hits
Longrange vs rapid and accurate
Ranging while clipped following

Mage:
Perfect spelltime calculation
Mage following when autocast clipped
Correct rune amounts
All non combat spells

[size=18pt]Non-Combat Skills:
[/size]

[size=14pt]Runecrafting:[/size]
Talisman location
Pouches
Multiple ess based on level
[/color]
[size=18pt]Agility:[/size]
Multiple courses
Rewards:
Werewolf: sticks right before zipline, trade in for exp
Gnome & barbarian: agility tickets to exchange for exp or rewards such as pirate hook or herbs

Herblore
Herb Identifying
Pestle & Mortar
Potion making
Mixing potions
[/COLOR]

Thieving:
Stall support
Most nearby guards will attack you if caught thieving
Pickpocketing
Pickpocket failing

[size=24pt]crafting:[/size]
Jewelry
Stringing
Hides
Gem cutting

[color=green]Fletching:[/color]
Cutting logs with knife
All log types supported
Making + stringing of longbow’s and shortbows
Arrows

Slayer:
Full task support easy, medium, hard, expert
Slayer Gem
Slayer Mask
Required equipment for slayer monsters
Task resetting

Mining + Smithing:
Full ore depletion and regeneration of rocks
Mining gems
Rock smoking - breaking pickaxe if you don’t get off it
Spawning golems randomly, level based off your combat level
Smithing with coal requirement
Refining iron ore based on level

Fishing + cooking:
All spots
Required equipment + bait
Correct animation and timer for getting fish
Cooking of all fish and uncooked products
Proper level requirements for cooking
Proper levels to no longer burn + cooking gauntlets support

Firemaking + Woodcutting:
Full tree support, trees have certain amount of logs before disappearing
Trees have longer regrow times depending on type
Full clipped firemaking with force walk west.
You put a log on the ground and then light it, so if you walk away you leave a log.
If you burn fast enough your animation doesn’t take place

Undead Waves: <---- ima dele later game with the base

  • 20 waves
  • Waves are always different, can have an unlimited combination of the three npcs being (Giant zombie, zombie, nechromancer)
  • Each wave has one more than the last, wave 20 has 20 npcs, 19 has 19 ect.
  • If you fail before you complete you are simply given coins per wave
  • If you complete all 20 you are rewarded with a casket that has a mystery inside

Mage Arena:
Graveyard minigame
Alchemists playground
Enchanters minigame
Progress hat dialogue
pizzaz points for infinity and wands

Duel Arena:
Full staking support
Rules support
Anti-dupe, x-logging, scamming.

Jad: Undecided how many waves
Jad mage, range, melee
Other npcs in the Jad waves with proper hits and moves

Barrows:
Random brother in cave each time
Random Barrow loot
Kill counts increase loot
Cave collapsing
Digging to get to their dens

Random Events:
Evil Chicken
Tree spirit
Frogs
Gene
Mime
Drill Sergeant
Rock Golem

Perfect combat with respect to player armor and npc’s attack type and level
Proper animations and economical drops
Npc Vs Npc combat
Respect to multizones
Aggression

Bosses:
Kalphite Queen
Jad
Gunthar (level 112)
Khazard General
Dragons
